
/!\ Please read the following guidelines before making any changes to the skin directory. /!\

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Do not add, delete, or modify any file in the core folder. 
  The content of the Core folder is maintained in the product by Agileo Automation and it can be 
  overwritten by a more advanced version of the skin.

- It is possible not to use a file contained in Core folder by commenting the associated line in App.xaml.

- Any specific or modified content must be in the Custom folder.

- If you want to make a change in any of the provided resources, you had to duplicate the desired file in 
  the custom folder, and replace the use of the old file with the new one in the App.Xaml

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
